name: Click me! (Chaos315)
description:
short game made for the mini jam 67.  I forgot about the jam completely so i had to throw something together quick.

if you don't want to click the button so many times, the rewards are, when you get to 100 an exclamation point is added, and once you click your score goes up by 2.  once you get to 500 your score goes up by 7, and there are more exclamation points!
